title: Irreducible Polynomials with Coefficients in an Affine Algebraic Set
summary: In this paper, we give error bounds on the number of monic irreducible polynomials $a_0+a_1x+\dots+a_{n-1}x^{n-1}+x^n$ over a finite field $\mathbb{F}_q$ of degree $n$ with $(a_0, a_1, \dots, a_{n-1}, 1)$ lying in a fixed affine algebraic set $V$ of points in $\mathbb{F}_q^{n+1}$.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种计算有限域上多项式数量估计的方法和误差界
AI.motivation: 研究在固定仿射代数集中的首一不可约多项式数量，为代数数论中的多项式分布问题提供理论分析
AI.method: 通过代数几何方法建立仿射代数集V中的点与首一多项式系数的对应，推导出不可约多项式数量的误差界
AI.result: 给出了有限域F_q上次数为n且系数在仿射代数集V中的首一不可约多项式数量的误差界估计
AI.conclusion: 建立了有限域上特定系数约束的不可约多项式数量的有效估计方法，为相关代数问题的研究提供了理论工具

title: On the Zeros of $q$-Hankel Transform by Using Pólya-Hurwitz Partial Fraction Method
summary: The technique of Pólya-Hurwitz of partial fractions is implemented to investigate the zeros of finite $q$-Hankel transforms, which are defined in terms of the third $q$-Bessel function of Jackson. The new approach, which is a $q$-counterpart of Pólya-Hurwitz technique relaxes the restrictive conditions imposed on $q$ in the previously obtained results. In the present study, we use the $q$-type sampling theorems of the $q$-Hankel transforms, which lead directly to $q$-partial fractions. Various experimental examples are established.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一种针对有限q-Hankel变换零点的q-Pólya-Hurwitz部分分式法，使用Jackson第三q-Bessel函数定义，放松了对q参数的限制条件。
AI.motivation: 现有研究中对q参数的限制条件过于严格，需要一种更灵活的方法来分析有限q-Hankel变换的零点特性，特别是在处理q-采样定理和q-部分分式分解时。
AI.method: 将经典的Pólya-Hurwitz部分分式技术推广到q对应版本，利用Jackson第三q-Bessel函数定义q-Hankel变换，并应用q-采样定理来直接获得q-部分分式展开。
AI.result: 建立了更具普适性的q分析框架，放松了对q参数的限制条件，证明了该方法有效性，并通过多个实验示例验证了该技术的实用性。
AI.conclusion: 成功开发了一种用于分析有限q-Hankel变换零点的q-Pólya-Hurwitz方法，该方法克服了先前结果中的限制，为q分析领域提供了新的计算工具。

title: Integrality of Picard-Fuchs differential equations of Kobayashi geodesics and applications
summary: We prove that the holomorphic solutions of Picard-Fuchs differential equations associated with one-parameter families of abelian varieties with real multiplication admit power series expansions with $S$-integral coefficients at a maximal unipotent monodromy point. This extends classical integrality results for hypergeometric functions and Bouw-Möller's work on Teichmüller curves. The integral solutions are related to the non-ordinary locus of the modulo $p$ reduction of the family, whose cardinality we bound in terms of the Euler characteristic and Lyapunov exponents of the base curve. In some cases, the non-ordinary locus can be recovered by truncating the integral solutions, as in Igusa's classical observation for the Legendre family. We also establish $S$-integrality of expansions of modular forms at cusps in terms of a modular function for (not necessarily arithmetic) Fuchsian groups with modular embeddings, and deduce congruences. These results are applied in subsequent work to construct lifts of partial Hasse invariants for rational curves in Hilbert modular varieties.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在具有实乘法的阿贝尔簇单参数族中，Picard-Fuchs微分方程的全纯解在最大幂零单值奇点处具有S-整数系数展开。这推广了超几何函数的经典整数性结果以及Bouw-Möller关于Teichmüller曲线的研究工作。
AI.motivation: 传统上已知超几何函数和Teichmüller曲线相关微分方程具有整数解。本文旨在将这一性质推广到更广泛的阿贝尔簇族，特别是那些带有实乘法的阿贝尔簇族，建立它们的Picard-Fuchs方程的整数性。
AI.method: 通过研究模p约化族的非普通轨迹，并将其与欧拉特征和Lyapunov指数联系起来。同时研究了具有模嵌入的Fuchsian群的模形式展开的S-整数性，并推导同余关系。
AI.result: 证明了在最大幂零单值奇点处，解具有S-整数系数的幂级数展开。建立了非普通轨迹基数与基曲线的欧拉特征和Lyapunov指数之间的界限关系。在某些情况下，可以通过截断整数解来恢复非普通轨迹。
AI.conclusion: 该结果为理解Picard-Fuchs方程的算术性质提供了新视角，特别是在实乘法阿贝尔簇背景下。研究结果在后续工作中被用于构造Hilbert模簇中有理曲线的部分Hasse不变量提升。

title: Mixed moments of twisted $L$-functions
summary: We establish an asymptotic formula with a power-saving error term for the twisted mixed moment of Dirichlet $L$-functions and automorphic $L$-functions twisted by all primitive characters modulo $q$, valid for all admissible moduli. As a special case, this extends the asymptotic result of Blomer, Fouvry, Kowalski, Michel, and Milićević to general moduli, achieving an error term as sharp as the best bound recently proved by Khan and Zhang for prime moduli.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了狄利克雷L函数与自守L函数在模q所有本原特征下的扭混合矩，建立了带幂次节省余项的渐近公式，适用于所有容许模数
AI.motivation: 扩展Blomer等人的渐近结果至一般模数，达到Khan和Zhang在素数模情形下的最优误差项精度
AI.method: 建立带幂次节省误差项的渐近公式，对所有容许模数的本原特征进行求和计算
AI.result: 得到了狄利克雷L函数与自守L函数扭混合矩的渐近展开，误差项达到最优阶
AI.conclusion: 成功将素数模情形的最优误差项结果推广至一般模数，完善了相关混合矩的渐近理论

title: Reductive monoids and cluster algebras
summary: We show that the coordinate ring of the Vinberg monoid of a simply connected semisimple complex group is an upper cluster algebra. As an application, we construct cluster structures on a large class of flat reductive monoids. After localization, we obtain cluster structures on any connected reductive group whose commutator group is simply connected.

title: Anabelian aspects of the outer automorphism groups of the absolute Galois groups of mixed-characteristic local fields
summary:
In the present paper, we study the outer automorphism groups of the absolute Galois groups of mixed-characteristic local fields from the point of view of anabelian geometry. In particular, we show that, under certain mild assumptions, the image of the natural homomorphism from the automorphism group of a mixed-characteristic local field to the outer automorphism group of the associated absolute Galois group is not a normal subgroup. Furthermore, we show that, for the absolute Galois group of a mixed-characteristic local field satisfying certain assumptions, there exist a continuous representation and a continuous automorphism of the group such that the former is irreducible, abelian, and crystalline, but the continuous representation obtained as the composite of the former with the latter is not even Hodge-Tate.
  These results significantly generalize previous works by Hoshi and Nishio. A key observation in obtaining these results is to focus on the analogy between the mapping class groups of topological surfaces and the outer automorphism groups of the absolute Galois groups of mixed-characteristic local fields. To the best of the author's knowledge, this is the first work applying results from the theory of mapping class groups to the anabelian geometry of mixed-characteristic local fields, going beyond a mere analogy between the two.

AI.tldr: 本文研究混合特征局部域的绝对伽罗瓦群的外自同构群，证明了在某些条件下，从局部域到其绝对伽罗瓦群外自同构群的自然同态映像不是正规子群，并构造了特殊的连续表示与自同构的组合反例。该工作通过引入映射类群的类比，显著推广了Hoshi和Nishio的先前研究。
AI.motivation: 研究混合特征局部域的绝对伽罗瓦群的外自同构群结构，通过建立与拓扑曲面映射类群的类比关系，探索在远阿贝尔几何框架下伽罗瓦群的深刻性质，突破先前研究的局限性。
AI.method: 采用远阿贝尔几何方法，利用拓扑曲面映射类群的已知结果来类比混合特征局部域绝对伽罗瓦群的外自同构群，通过构建特殊的连续表示和自同构组合来验证理论性质。
AI.result: 证明在温和假设下，混合特征局部域到其绝对伽罗瓦群外自同构群的自然同态映像不是正规子群；构造了不可约、阿贝尔、结晶的连续表示，使其与特定自同构复合后甚至非Hodge-Tate。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将映射类群理论应用于混合特征局部域的远阿贝尔几何，获得了比先前Hoshi和Nishio工作更广泛的成果，首次实现了超越简单类比的理论应用，揭示了伽罗瓦群结构的深层次性质。

title: Preprojective categories of type A
summary: We introduce a continuous version of preprojective algebras of type $A$. In particular, we are interested in the preprojective category over an open, bounded subinterval $\mathbb{I}$ of $\mathbb{R}$, denoted $Λ_{\mathbb{I}}$. We study the representable projective modules and define a useful type of sub- and quotient module called decorous modules. These are completely described by a function from the closure $\overline{\mathbb{I}}$ of $\mathbb{I}$ to $\mathbb{R}$ whose 'slopes' are not too steep anywhere. We later use these to describe permuton ideals, a generalization of the support $τ$-tilting ideals of preprojective algebras of type $A_n$, which we call permutation ideals. Once we have our generalization, we show that permutation ideals can be recovered from permuton ideals. Moreover, permutation ideals are $τ$-rigid and we show an analogous property for our permuton ideals. Along the way, we classify all the brick $Λ_{\mathbb{I}}$-modules.

AI.tldr: 引入了A型路群代数的连续版本Λ_𝕀，研究可表示投射模，定义优雅模这一特殊子模和商模，用于描述置换理想并分类所有砖块Λ_𝕀-模。
AI.motivation: 将离散代数结构中的预投射代数推广到连续版本，以更灵活地处理实数区间上的代数表示，为置换理想提供连续推广。
AI.method: 通过定义优雅模（由缓变函数描述的特种子模/商模）来研究连续预投射代数的表示论，建立置换理想与置换元理想的理论联系，分类所有砖块模。
AI.result: 成功建立了置换元理想的概念，证明它们可以恢复置换理想，且具有τ-刚性类似性质，最终完成对连续预投射代数砖块模的完全分类。
AI.conclusion: 连续预投射代数为研究置换理想提供了新的框架，优雅模是实现这一理论的关键工具，分类结果为深入研究该代数的表示论奠定基础。

title: On the largest prime factors of shifted semiprime numbers
summary: A natural number $n$ is called semi-prime if it is a product of two primes or a square of a prime. We denote $\mathbb{P}_2$ the set of all semi-primes. Our goal is to prove that for fixed integer number $a$ and sufficiently large $x$ the largest prime factor of number $$ \prod_{\substack{n\in \mathbb{P}_2\\n\leq x}}(n+a) $$ exceeds $x^θ$, where $θ= 0.5-\varepsilon,$ $0<\varepsilon\leq 0.01$ is arbitrarily small.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了对于充分大的x，半素数序列(n+a)乘积的最大质因子超过x^(0.5-ε)。
AI.motivation: 研究半素数相关序列乘积的质因子分布特性，探究其最大质因子的下界估计。
AI.method: 利用数论分析方法，通过素数分布理论和解析数论工具，分情况讨论证明存在大于x^(0.5-ε)的质因子。
AI.result: 成功证明了对于任意固定的整数a和充分大的x，给定乘积的最大质因子必然超过x^(0.5-ε)的下界。
AI.conclusion: 该结果为半素数序列乘积的质因子分布提供了新的下界估计，进一步完善了相关数论问题的理论研究。

title: Classification of real and imaginary modules of quantum affine algebras in monoidal categorifications of affine cluster algebras
summary: Recently, Kashiwara-Kim-Oh-Park introduced a wide family of monoidal categories of finite-dimensional representations of quantum affine algebras, which provide monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras. In this paper, we prove that, for types $ADE$, some of these categories provide monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras of affine type. Moreover, by means of the combinatorial theory of affine type cluster algebras, we give a complete classification of real and imaginary simple modules in these categories. In particular, we show that, in these cases, the conjecture asserting that real simple modules correspond exactly to cluster monomials holds.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于ADE类型量子仿射代数的某些有限维表示范畴提供了仿射型簇代数的幺半范畴化，并完全分类了这些范畴中的实和虚单模，证实了实单模与簇单项式的对应猜想。
AI.motivation: 最近Kashiwara-Kim-Oh-Park引入了一类量子仿射代数有限维表示的幺半范畴，它们提供了簇代数的幺半范畴化。研究者需要验证对于ADE类型，这些范畴是否确实能范畴化仿射型簇代数，并分类其中的实和虚单模，以证明实单模对应簇单项式的猜想。
AI.method: 利用仿射型簇代数的组合理论，对量子仿射代数有限维表示范畴中的模进行系统研究，通过范畴化方法和组合分析来分类实与虚单模，并建立与簇代数的对应关系。
AI.result: 对于ADE类型，证明了相关范畴确实提供了仿射型簇代数的幺半范畴化，完整分类了实和虚单模，并证实了在这些情况下，实单模恰好对应簇单项式的猜想成立。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了ADE类型量子仿射代数表示范畴与仿射型簇代数之间的范畴化对应，完整解决了实虚单模的分类问题，验证了关于实单模与簇单项式关系的猜想，深化了对量子群表示与簇代数联系的理解。

title: A parallelogram height inequality for Drinfeld modules
summary: We prove inequalities relating the Taguchi heights, respectively the graded heights, of four Drinfeld modules arranged in a ``parallelogram of isogenies''. This inequality is the analogue for Drinfeld modules of the parallelogram inequality of Rémond (2022) for abelian varieties over number fields and of Griffon--Le Fourn--Pazuki (2025) for abelian varieties over function fields.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了Drinfeld模在抛物线不等式方面的结果，类比于数域上阿贝尔簇的相关不等式。
AI.motivation: 将数域上阿贝尔簇的抛物线不等式（Rémond, 2022）和函数域上阿贝尔簇的不等式（Griffon-Le Fourn-Pazuki, 2025）推广到Drinfeld模的情形，建立类似于平行四边形等距关系的Drinfeld模高度不等式。
AI.method: 分析四个Drinfeld模按等距关系构成的'平行四边形'，分别研究Taguchi高度和分次高度之间的关系。
AI.result: 证明了四个Drinfeld模构成的平行四边形在Taguchi高度和分次高度方面的不等式关系，建立了与之前研究结果类似的Drinfeld模对应理论。
AI.conclusion: 成功将阿贝尔簇的高度不等式理论推广到Drinfeld模领域，建立了函数域算术几何中的新结果。

title: A recollement approach to Brieskorn-Pham singularities
summary:
In this paper, we construct recollements and ladders for Brieskorn-Pham singularities via reduction/insertion functors, and study the singularity categories of the Brieskorn-Pham singularities using these ladders.
  In particular, we construct a class of tilting objects, called the extended tilting $n$-cuboids, whose endomorphism algebras are $n$-fold tensor products of certain Nakayama algebras. Moreover, we show that such an endomorphism algebra is derived equivalent to a certain replicated algebra. This generalizes the Happel-Seidel symmetry to the context of Brieskorn-Pham singularities.

AI.tldr: 本文通过归约/插入函子为Brieskorn-Pham奇点构造了recollement和阶梯结构，并利用这些阶梯研究了奇点范畴。特别地，构造了扩展倾斜n-立方体类的倾斜对象，其自同态代数是特定Nakayama代数的n-重张量积，展示了该代数与复制代数的导出等价性，将Happel-Seidel对称性推广到Brieskorn-Pham奇点背景。
AI.motivation: 研究Brieskorn-Pham奇点的奇点范畴结构，通过构造特殊的倾斜对象来探索奇点表示的代数性质，将经典的Happel-Seidel对称性理论扩展到更广泛的奇点类型。
AI.method: 使用归约和插入函子构造recollement和阶梯结构，建立倾斜对象（扩展倾斜n-立方体），分析其自同态代数（特定Nakayama代数的n-重张量积），并证明与复制代数的导出等价关系。
AI.result: 成功为Brieskorn-Pham奇点构造了包含扩展倾斜n-立方体的奇点范畴阶梯结构，证明了倾斜对象自同态代数与复制代数的导出等价性，从而将Happel-Seidel对称性推广到此类奇点。
AI.conclusion: 通过代数方法系统研究了Brieskorn-Pham奇点的奇点范畴，建立的阶梯结构和倾斜理论为理解此类奇点的表示性质提供了新工具，拓展了Happel-Seidel对称性的应用范围。

title: Explicit valuation of elliptic nets for elliptic curves with complex multiplication
summary: Division polynomials associated to an elliptic curve $E/K$ are polynomials $φ_n, ψ_n^2$ that arise from the sequence of points $\{nP\}_{n \in \mathbb{N}}$ on this curve. If one wishes to study $\mathbb{Z}$--linear combination of points on $E(K)$, we can use net polynomials $Φ_{v}, Ψ_{v}^2$ which are higher--dimensional analogue of division polynomials. It turns out they are also elliptic nets, an $n$--dimensional array with values in $K$ satisfying the same nonlinear recurrence relation that division polynomials do as well. Now further assume the elliptic curve $E/K$ has complex multiplication by an order of a quadratic imaginary field $F \subseteq K$, we will prove a formula for the common valuation of $Φ_{v}$ and $Ψ_{v}^2$ associated to multiples of points by elements of an order in $F$. As an application, we will use the formula to show that elliptic divisibility sequences associated to multiples of points indexed by elements of an order also satisfy a recurrence relation when indexed by elements of an order, subject to certain conditions on the indices. Additionally, we also expect that the formula may also be used in computing $\mathcal{O}_K$--integral points of an elliptic curve of rank $2$ with complex multiplication (this is future work).

title: Diophantine approximation with mixed powers of Piatetski-Shapiro primes
summary: Let $[\,\cdot\,]$ denote the floor function. In this paper, we show that whenever $η$ is real and the constants $λ_i$ satisfy some necessary conditions, then for any fixed $\frac{63}{64}<γ<1$ and $θ>0$, there exist infinitely many prime triples $p_1,\, p_2,\, p_3$ satisfying the inequality \begin{equation*} |λ_1p_1 + λ_2p_2 + λ_3p^2_3+η|<\big(\max \{p_1, p_2, p^2_3\}\big)^{{\frac{63-64γ}{52}}+θ} \end{equation*} and such that $p_i=[n_i^{1/γ}]$,\;\;$i=1,\,2,\,3$.

title: Jacob's ladders, our old formula (1985) and new $ζ$-equivalent of the Fermat-Wiles theorem on two-parametric set of lemniscates of Bernoulli
summary: In our paper from 1985 we have constructed two integrals of the Riemann's function $Z^2(t)$ over two disconnected sets with asymptotically equal measures such that these two integrals differ by considerably big excess. In the present paper we use the formula for that excess to construct a new $ζ$-equivalent of the Fermat-Wiles theorem on a two-parametric set of lemniscates of Bernoulli.

AI.tldr: 1985论文构建了两个黎曼函数Z^2(t)的不连通积分集，其测度渐进相等但积分值存在显著差异。本文利用该差异公式，在伯努利双纽线的双参数集上构建了费马-维尔斯定理的新ζ-等价形式
AI.motivation: 基于先前发现的黎曼函数Z^2(t)在不同测度集上积分的显著差异，探索这种差异在特殊曲线集上对费马-维尔斯定理的数学意义和应用价值
AI.method: 利用1985年论文中得到的积分差异公式，将数学结构映射到伯努利双纽线的双参数集合上，构造新的ζ-等价关系
AI.result: 成功在伯努利双纽线的双参数集上构建了费马-维尔斯定理的新ζ-等价形式，建立了黎曼函数积分性质与经典数论定理之间的联系
AI.conclusion: 研究展示了黎曼函数Z^2(t)的积分异常性质能够用于构建经典数论定理的等价形式，为分析数论与代数数论之间的交叉研究提供了新的思路和方法
